issue.title: [Packaging][RPM] Fix conflict with arrow-libs and arrow8-libs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16766](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16766). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`/usr/share/doc/arrow/*` such as `/usr/share/doc/arrow/README.md` are conflicted. We should not use `%doc`?
